description: Detects webshells that use GET requests by keyword searches in URL strings Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Web sites like wikis with articles on os commands and pages that include the os commands in the URLs
User searches in search boxes of the respective website
name: Webshell Detection by Keyword
